headline.print_headline: U.S. Space Industry Girds for More Oversight After Accidents
headline.main: U.S. Space Industry Girds for More Oversight After Accidents

lead_paragraph: Executives in the fledgling commercial U.S. space industry are bracing for increased scrutiny and oversight after two accidents last week, including one that killed a pilot, but say they view the mishaps as temporary setbacks that will not halt launches.
